definitions.usage_example: Does the price include breakfast?

We will continue the discussion tomorrow.

definitions.usage_example: We want to create a new project.
The noise created a disturbance.

definitions.usage_example_es: Mi mamá me permite quedarme despierto hasta tarde.

definitions.usage_example: Allow me a moment to think.
definitions.alternative_example: We need to allow for delays.

definitions.usage_example: Did you add your name to the list?
definitions.alternative_example: He added that he was tired.

definitions.usage_example: I spend too much money on clothes.
We spend the weekend at the beach.

definitions.usage_example: The plant grows very fast.
definitions.alternative_example: The children have grown a lot.

definitions.usage_example: They grow vegetables in their garden.

definitions.usage_example: What solution did they offer?
I can't remember his name.
Remember me to your family.
definitions.usage_example_es: Dale mis saludos a tu familia.

definitions.alternative_example: I am considering a new career.

definitions.usage_example: I consider him a good friend.
I expect a call from him soon.

definitions.usage_example_es: Espero una llamada de él pronto.

definitions.usage_example: What do you expect of me?
They serve dinner at 7 PM.
definitions.usage_example_es: Sirven la cena a las 7 PM.

definitions.usage_example: This tool serves many purposes.
definitions.usage_example_es: Esta herramienta sirve para muchos propósitos.

definitions.alternative_example: We are building a tree house.

definitions.usage_example: He built his reputation on honesty.
definitions.alternative_example: It takes time to build trust.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él construyó su reputación con honestidad.

definitions.usage_example: Can you reach the top shelf?
We reached the city after a long drive.
definitions.usage_example_es: Llegamos a la ciudad después de un largo viaje.

definitions.usage_example: Mosquitoes can kill people.
The new law killed the project.
definitions.alternative_example: Let's kill some time with a movie.

definitions.usage_example: Please remain seated until the end.
definitions.alternative_example: She remained calm during the crisis.
definitions.usage_example_es: Por favor, permanezca sentado hasta el final.

definitions.usage_example: Only a few minutes remain.
definitions.alternative_example: The remaining pieces are on the table.

definitions.usage_example: I suggest we take a break.
The evidence suggests he is guilty.
definitions.usage_example_es: La evidencia sugiere que es culpable.

definitions.usage_example: Raise your hand if you know the answer.
definitions.usage_example_es: Levanta la mano si sabes la respuesta.

definitions.usage_example: They raise their children to be kind.
definitions.alternative_example: He raises cattle on his farm.
definitions.usage_example_es: Crían a sus hijos para que sean amables.

definitions.usage_example: The job requires a lot of experience.
The law requires you to wear a seatbelt.
definitions.usage_example_es: La ley exige que uses un cinturón de seguridad.

definitions.usage_example: Please report any problem to the manager.
definitions.usage_example_es: Por favor, informe cualquier problema al gerente.

definitions.usage_example: Report to the office at 9 AM.
definitions.usage_example_es: Preséntese en la oficina a las 9 AM.

definitions.usage_example: We need to decide quickly.
definitions.alternative_example: Have you decided on a color?

definitions.usage_example: The judge will decide the case.
What are you wearing today?
The carpet is starting to wear out.
definitions.usage_example_es: La alfombra está empezando a desgastarse.

definitions.usage_example: I wish you a happy birthday.
She wished for peace.
definitions.alternative_example: I wish to speak to the manager.

definitions.usage_example: We need to develop new skills.
The project is developing well.
definitions.usage_example_es: El proyecto se está desarrollando bien.

definitions.usage_example: Can you carry this bag for me?

definitions.alternative_example: They carried out the plan successfully.

definitions.usage_example: I agree with your opinion.
definitions.usage_example_es: Estoy de acuerdo con tu opinión.

definitions.alternative_example: They finally agreed on a price.
definitions.usage_example_es: El verbo debe concordar con el sujeto.

definitions.usage_example_es: Los estudiantes formaron un grupo de estudio.

The contract provides for a penalty.

definitions.alternative_example: He represents the company at the event.

definitions.usage_example_es: Déjame explicar mi punto de vista.

definitions.alternative_example: He suddenly appeared at the door.

definitions.alternative_example: It appears you made a mistake.

definitions.alternative_example: Where did you buy that shirt?

definitions.usage_example: Do you want to join our team?
definitions.alternative_example: I joined the gym last month.

definitions.usage_example: Join these two pieces together.
definitions.alternative_example: The river joins the sea here.

Be careful not to break the glass.

definitions.usage_example: Let's break for lunch.

Catch the ball!

I can't forget what she said.

definitions.usage_example_es: Aprendí a conducir el año pasado.

definitions.usage_example: Hunger drove him to steal.
definitions.alternative_example: That noise is driving me crazy.

definitions.usage_example: What do you want to eat for dinner?
The acid eats away at the metal.
It's important to drink water.
definitions.alternative_example: What would you like to drink?

definitions.usage_example: He doesn't drink alcohol.
definitions.alternative_example: They drank a toast to the bride.

definitions.usage_example: I need to sleep for eight hours.
This tent sleeps four people.
definitions.usage_example_es: Esta tienda aloja a cuatro personas.

definitions.usage_example: Can you swim in the ocean?
My head is swimming.
definitions.alternative_example: The room swam before my eyes.

definitions.usage_example: Birds can fly very high.
definitions.alternative_example: I am flying to New York tomorrow.
definitions.usage_example_es: Los pájaros pueden volar muy alto.

definitions.usage_example: Time flies when you are having fun.
definitions.usage_example_es: El tiempo vuela cuando te diviertes.

definitions.usage_example: How much does this cost?
definitions.alternative_example: It cost me a lot of money.

definitions.usage_example: The mistake cost him his job.
definitions.usage_example_es: El error le costó el trabajo.

definitions.usage_example: I will always support your decisions.
The columns support the roof.

definitions.alternative_example: She described her trip to Japan.

definitions.usage_example_es: El libro relata la historia de la ciudad.

definitions.usage_example: I promise I will call you later.

definitions.usage_example: The clear sky promises a good day.

He searched his pockets for his keys.
